name: Forever Asleep 1.0
description:
Forever asleep is a very short game about a boy who gets into a car crash and goes into a coma. You enter a world of your consciousness and you must find a way to escape... can you?

I believe that I will start streaming my GameDev journey on twitch once I get everything set up for it,

Discord Here

Any donations to the game to help with making my stream better (As I don't have a mic or camera) would be greatly appreciated! Enjoy the game!
